title: 2018 Week 13 Recap!
itunes:title: 2018 Week 13 Recap!
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling – react to Green Bay parting ways with long time head coach Mike McCarthy following Sunday’s loss to Arizona (1:00). After, the heroes explore the NFC North playoff picture following Chicago’s grizzly loss to the Giants (7:20), TB12 eclipses 1k rushing (!!!)…and also muzzles Minnesota (13:15), Kansas City fends off a pesky Raiders bunch (25:00), Lamar’s lissome running style was enough to overcome the Dirty Birds, but will he and Flacco share snaps in the near future (30:40), Houston’s defense flusters Baker (36:00) and the race for the AFC South crown becomes wider with Indy’s loss to division foe Jags (42:30). Lastly, the heroes illuminate the keys to the Chargers victory in Pittsburgh on SNF (1:11:30)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
